title: Here are the 10 most central claims that have shaped the debate about Greenland
content: This article was written and published by TjekDet . Donald Trump revived his desire to own Greenland for reasons of national security when he was reinstated as President of the United States a year ago. And over the past month, the rhetoric has intensified. Donald Trump himself, other American politicians, and American influencers have put forward a wide range of claims that have attracted significant international attention and have been intended to support and legitimize the American desire to...
creator: Team NORDIS
sourceDescription: The Nordic Observatory for Digital Media and Information Disorder
